hero.title: Discover Your Instagram
hero.subtitle: The only safe way to analyze your Instagram relationships. No scraping, no account risks, no broken tools. Simply upload Meta's official data export to discover your follow relationships instantly.

video.title: See How It Works
video.description: Watch this quick guide to learn how to export your Instagram data and analyze your relationships.
video.browserNotSupported: Your browser does not support the video tag.

upload.title: Upload Your Instagram Data
upload.subtitle: Select the ZIP file you downloaded from Instagram's data export feature.

errors.invalidFile: Please select a valid ZIP file

security.title: 100% Clean & Safe
security.description: No scraping, no bans, no broken apps. Uses only Meta's official data export. Your data stays in your browser.

speed.title: Lightning Fast
speed.description: Get instant results with our optimized data processing algorithms.

analysis.title: Detailed Analysis
analysis.description: See mutual follows, one-way relationships, and comprehensive statistics.

howTo.title: How to Export Your Instagram Data

step2.title: Create Export
step2.description: Select your Instagram account ‚Üí Choose "Download to device"

step3.title: Customize Information
step3.description: Uncheck all ‚Üí Check only Contacts ‚Üí Followers and Following ‚Üí Save

howTo.tip: ‚ö° Fast Export: With only followers data selected, your export will be ready in less than a minute! You'll receive an email with the download link immediately.

results.noResults: No results found. Please upload your Instagram data first.
results.title: Your Instagram Follow Analysis

descriptions.mutual: People who follow you and you follow back
descriptions.youFollow: People you follow but they don't follow you back
descriptions.theyFollow: People who follow you but you don't follow them back
descriptions.closeFriends: Users you've added to your close friends list
descriptions.pending: Follow requests you've sent that are still pending
descriptions.recentRequests: Recent follow requests received from other users

empty.searchNoResults: No accounts matching "{query}" found in this category.
empty.youFollow: Everyone you follow follows you back!
empty.theyFollow: You follow everyone who follows you!

share.title: Instagram Follow Analysis

madeWith.suffix: for Instagram users who want to understand their connections

footer.description:
This project is open source and respects Meta's Terms of Service.
Your data is processed locally and never leaves your browser.
